summary: Pixar is an American animation studio famous for its computer-animated movies. It was founded in 1979 and later became a part of Walt Disney Studios. Pixar's first film was *Toy Story* (1995), and it has since made 28 feature films, many of which have won awards and made a lot of money. The studio is known for its innovative technology and has won 23 Academy Awards. Its films, like *Finding Nemo* and *Up*, are loved by critics and audiences worldwide. Pixar's success continues with recent hits like *Inside Out 2* (2024).
title: Pixar
